com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

Class ContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.ContextFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlContextFactory

    public abstract class ContextFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides access to an InfinitumContext singleton. Before an InfinitumContext can be retrieved, configure(Context, int) must be called, which will read in configuration settings from infinitum.cfg.xml. If an attempt to access the context is made before it has been configured, an InfinitumConfigurationException will be thrown.

    ContextFactory instances can be retrieved by calling newInstance().

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 05/18/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • configure

        public abstract InfinitumContext configure(Context context)
                                    throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Configures Infinitum with the implicit configuration file res/raw/infinitum.cfg.xml. This method must be called before attempting to retrieve an InfinitumContext.
        Parameters:
        context - the calling Context.
        Returns:
        configured InfinitumContext
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if the implied configuration file could not be found or if the file could not be parsed

      • configure

        public abstract InfinitumContext configure(Context context,
                         int configId)
                                    throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Configures Infinitum with the specified configuration file. This method must be called before attempting to retrieve an InfinitumContext.
        Parameters:
        context - the calling Context
        configId - the resource ID for the raw XML configuration file
        Returns:
        configured InfinitumContext
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if the configuration file could not be found or if the file could not be parsed

      • getContext

        public abstract InfinitumContext getContext()
                                     throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Retrieves the InfinitumContext singleton. configure(Context) must be called before using this method. Otherwise, an InfinitumConfigurationException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the InfinitumContext singleton
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if configure was not called

      • getPersistencePolicy

        public abstract PersistencePolicy getPersistencePolicy()
        Retrieves the configured PersistencePolicy.
        Returns:
        PersistencePolicy
